attributes.action: A petition to stop a 2nd referendum on the EU vote to leave or Remain
attributes.additional_details: With 52% of the UK population voting to leave the EU it's a landslide victory the vote should be taken just one time it will not be any different the 2nd time around its a waste of tax payers money
attributes.background: This petition is to stop a 2nd referendum from happening for a vote to pull out of the EU we have already voted and it's already been decided we do not need a 2nd referendum
